about_the_game:
Pamali: The Vengeful Mother is a new folklore from Storytale’s Pamali: Indonesian Folklore Horror series.

A 1-4 players online co-op survival horror. Use each character’s unique strengths, strategize with your teammates, do everything you can to save the missing children and escape the abandoned orphanage. Bring your friends!

THE FOLKLORE

On a hill somewhere in Central Java, Indonesia, 2022. You and your three childhood friends set out on a dare to trespass an abandoned orphanage after the sun sets. The abandoned orphanage is rumored to be the nest of “Wewe Gombel”, a spirit known for kidnapping children. You’ve found your way into the building, but suddenly, all the doors are sealed. Your dare has transformed into a nightmarish reality.

ARE YOU UP FOR THIS?

Play Solo or with Up to 4 Players

Fear not! join forces with up to 4 players for a truly chilling experience. As they say, there's strength in numbers, and the horrors that await are easier to bear with friends by your side. But don't worry, we've got your back if you prefer a solo adventure, though it won't be a walk in the park.

Pick Your Inner Survivor

Select from 4 unique characters, each with their own unique strengths. Whether you're the one who can see spirits, a powerhouse, a nimble and agile sprinter, or a tech-savvy genius, your choices matter. Together, your diverse strengths complement each other, paving the way for survival.

Dive into an Immersive Gameplay

What you do, see, or say will be a crucial element in defining the experiences you'll be going through. Use your unique strengths to defend, distract, or weaken your enemy, save the missing children and ultimately, escape! The horrors you'll encounter are almost all intentional, based on your own actions. Act carefully, think wisely.

Discover Multiple Endings

If you were in that situation, what would you do? As you play the game, you'll find yourself in numerous different situations each time. The decisions you make in the game will lead you to different routes and endings.

A Cultural Journey

The ghost, the settings, the events, the lore are all based on real Indonesian culture. You’ll learn all the weird and bizarre culture that shapes the horror itself.

Get ready to face your fears, with friends or on your own. Choose your character, make decisions, and uncover the mysteries lurking in the darkness. The horror awaits...

name: Pamali: The Vengeful Mother

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-7200U CPU @ 2.50Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 940MX
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-6700 CPU @ 3.40Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Pamali: The Vengeful Mother is a 1-4 players online co-op survival horror. Use each character’s unique strengths, strategize with your teammates, do everything you can to save the missing children and escape the abandoned orphanage. Bring your friends!
supported_languages:
English*, Indonesian
*languages with full audio support
